entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Varennes
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
